snippet: A report by the Congressional Research Service found that many concerns among medical device manufacturers about a tax under the Affordable Care Act were unfounded.
abstract: Congressional Research Service report finds that many concerns among medical device manufacturers about a tax under the Affordable Care Act are unfounded; determines that effect on jobs, research and profits are of minimal import and tax will be passed on in higher prices.
lead_paragraph: A report by the Congressional Research Service found that many concerns among medical device manufacturers about a tax under the Affordable Care Act were unfounded.

headline.main: New Analysis Challenges Arguments for Repealing Tax on Medical Devices
headline.print_headline: New Analysis Challenges Arguments for Repealing Tax on Medical Devices

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
